text: Am'minnal avarkalin parvaikalaip parittuvitap parkkiratu. A(m minnalana)tu avarkalukku oli tarum potellam, avarkal ati(n tunaiyina)l natakkirarkal; avarkalai irul culntu kollum potu (valiyariyatu) ninruvitukirarkal; melum allah natinal avarkalutaiya kelvip pulanaiyum, parvaikalaiyum pokkivituvan; niccayamaka allah ellavarrin mitum perarral utaiyavan
